replies.bodyText: Just as a note for all other api calls the api gives us the total page number. However it doesnt do that for the mapPool maps currently which is why it needs to be calculated here.
replies.author: Sheikah45

timeline.message:
Refactoring

Use Map instead of ImmutableMap
Use List.of instead of Collections.emptyList
Clean imports
Extract method in GameService
Use line breaks in stream operations
Controller refactoring
Add logging when matchmaker search stopped
Fix missing info on partymember cards

Refactoring

Move method from Party.java to TeamMatchmakingService
Refactor partychat logic
Cleanup todos
Reposition kick button
Disable queue buttons when someone is in a game
Change queue heading message when you are in queue
Cache api call and fix queue display bugs
Create new context menu for party members

timeline.bodyText: why would that be synchronized? I mean it just executes in site PlatformRun.later ... That make is synchronized because there is only one UI Thread !!!
timeline.author: 1-alex98

replies.bodyText: That is leftover from my attempts to fix a bug with concurrent access to the queue list. Using the synchronized list should fix it. I'll delete it
replies.author: BlackYps

timeline.bodyText: Since there might be a lot of messages received here. Only execute this very line on the UI  Thread no need to switch to the UI thread to check if the message is releavnt => 99% less execution on the UI thread for this action
timeline.author: 1-alex98

replies.author: BlackYps

timeline.message: do not show faction buttons on disable
ensure game path is valid before sending invite
Use i18n instead of hardcoded text
Change ready button to play button
hide ready button, disable join queue buttons based on party size and ownership, hide invite player button
WIP remove faction from matchmaker queue join, faction order fix, temporary ugly GameLaunchMessage parsing fix, temporary matchmaker game launch
switch faction buttons, fix flag on faction select, force faction selection
matchmaking - use faction ids instead of boolean array
notify and block party invite / join when in queue
Uppercase now controlled by styleclass to enable override by themes
Add new heading for queue area
Implement queue name lookup and shortening
Replace rating labels with league icon + label
Layout changes and playercard grows properly
tmm: parse factions as string, fix status indicators for own faction selection
fix queue join race condition, set queue joined button state based on server state
fix faction parsing for game launch message
unbump install4j version (to 7, use different key)
send own factions to server upon entering queue
select all factions in an empty party
Fix empty slot in party member pane
Align kick button to the right
Change queues heading text when player is not the party owner
Show invited players in invite dialog
catch game cancel during launch when multiqueueing
fix already in queue when starting a custom game
uncheck queue button when launch failed due to being in game
Add leader highlight for own player

Merge branch 'develop' into feature/team-matchmaking

Load division icon instead of avatar
Spawn new chat tabs only when necessary
Make code cleaner by removing checks for uppercase style class
Code cleanup (mostly deleting of redundant code)
Disable chat tab highlight on party message
Only highlight tab on new messages
Fix error in log on queue deselect
Add indication when partyMember is in a game
